title: Creamy lemon & cabbage pasta with garlic crumbs
directions: In a bowl, mix the breadcrumbs with half the oil and 1 garlic clove, and season well. Spread out on a large baking tray and bake for 8 mins, until crisp and golden. Remove and set aside. (Or fry)
Cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling water until al dente.

Meanwhile, pour the remaining oil into a frying pan, add the onion and remaining garlic, season and cook for about 4 mins until golden, then add the wine and lemon zest. Reduce for a few mins, then add the crème fraîche. Remove from heat but keep warm.

Add the cabbage to the pasta water for the last 3 mins of cooking time. Drain and return to the pan, add the creamy sauce to the pasta and toss together. Divide between 2 bowls and top with the crumbs.
ingredients: 200g short pasta Pasta such as twists, farfalle or penne
½ small head Savoy cabbage, very thinly sliced
